# Homework 1

```{r}
data <- read.csv2("euroleague_21_22.csv")
head(data)
```

## 1. Exploratory data analysis

### a)

**Discard the variable "No" from the data set.**

```{r}
data <- data[,-1]
head(data)
```

### b)

**Split variable "Min" using strsplit() function. Give the name aux to the output. The first element of each row will show the minutes that the player played in total.**

```{r}
aux <- strsplit(data$Min, ":")
aux <- sapply(aux, function(x) as.numeric(x[1]) + as.numeric(x[2])/60)
```

### c)

**Add a numerical variable to the data set named “Min 2” which shows how many minutes each player played in the game.**

```{r}
data <- cbind(aux, data)
colnames(data)[which(names(data) == "aux")] <- "Min 2"
head(data)
```
